DOC.brief_summary: Objective : The current study examine effectiveness culturally-appropriate adaptation diabetes prevention program ( DPP ) curriculum reduce type 2 diabetes risk Latinas history gestational diabetes mellitus ( GDM ) . Research Design Methods : Seventy-six Latinas age 18-45 year GDM past 3 year participate 8-week group-based , peer-educator lead lifestyle intervention base DPP , adaptation appropriate Latino culture recent mother . Clinical self-report indicator assess baseline , post-intervention ( month-3 ) , follow-up ( month-6 ) . Hypothesis-The modify culturally tailor DPP improve risk factor associate development type 2 DM .
DOC.brief_title: Community Approach Reduce Risks Diabetes After Gestational Diabetes Mellitus
